member.name: WS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_SUITE
member.summary: Defines the security algorithms and key lengths to be used with WS-Security. This setting is relevant to message security bindings and mixed-mode security bindings.

member.name: WS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_SUITE.canonicalizationAlgorithm
member.summary: Algorithm to use for XML canonicalization, such as the exclusive XML canonicalization algorithm. Setting this value to will default toWS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_CANONICALIZATION_EXCLUSIVE.

member.name: WS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_SUITE.digestAlgorithm
member.summary: Algorithm to use for message part digests, such as SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-384, or SHA-512. Setting this value to will default toWS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_DIGEST_SHA1.

member.name: WS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_SUITE.symmetricSignatureAlgorithm
member.summary: Algorithm to use for message authentication codes (also known as MACs or symmetric signatures) such as HMAC-SHA1, HMAC-SHA256, HMAC-SHA384, or HMAC-SHA512. Setting this value to will default toWS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_SYMMETRIC_SIGNATURE_HMAC_SHA1.

member.name: WS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_SUITE.asymmetricSignatureAlgorithm
member.summary: Algorithm to use for asymmetric signatures. Setting this value to will default toWS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_ASYMMETRIC_SIGNATURE_RSA_SHA1.

member.name: WS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_SUITE.encryptionAlgorithm
member.summary: Algorithm to use for message part encryption. Reserved for future use. Should be set to .

member.name: WS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_SUITE.keyDerivationAlgorithm
member.summary: Algorithm to use for deriving keys from other symmetric keys. Setting this value to will default toWS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_KEY_DERIVATION_P_SHA1.

member.name: WS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_SUITE.symmetricKeyWrapAlgorithm
member.summary: Algorithm to use for encrypting symmetric keys with other symmetric keys. Reserved for future use. Should be set to .

member.name: WS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_SUITE.asymmetricKeyWrapAlgorithm
member.summary: Algorithm to use for encrypting symmetric keys with asymmetric keys. Setting this value to will default toWS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_ASYMMETRIC_KEYWRAP_RSA_OAEP.

member.name: WS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_SUITE.minSymmetricKeyLength
member.summary: The minimum key length (in bits) of symmetric key security tokens. Setting this value to 0 will default to 128 bits.

member.name: WS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_SUITE.maxSymmetricKeyLength
member.summary: The maximum key length (in bits) of symmetric key security tokens. Setting this value to 0 will default to 512 bits.

member.name: WS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_SUITE.minAsymmetricKeyLength
member.summary: The minimum key length (in bits) of asymmetric key security tokens. Setting this value to 0 will default to 1024 bits.

member.name: WS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_SUITE.maxAsymmetricKeyLength
member.summary: The maximum key length (in bits) of asymmetric key security tokens. Setting this value to 0 will default to 16384 bits.

member.name: WS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_SUITE.properties
member.summary: Algorithm properties. Reserved for future use. Should be set to NULL.

member.name: WS_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_SUITE.propertyCount
member.summary: Number of entries in properties array. Reserved for future use. Should be set to 0.
